thread.section_title: LensFactory Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LensFactory | lensfactory.com
thread.title: Paula

author: Paula
title: Paula
text: I knew I needed a new prescription, but wasn't looking forward to the huge expense of all new glasses. Luckily, I had a pair of frames I really liked, but the lenses had scratched over the years. When I learned about Lens Factory, I decided to give them a try--and I'm really glad! The new lenses worked out great. If I had more frames in good shape, I'd be tempted to get more than one pair!
